level.heading: Appropriation.
level.text: There is hereby authorized to be appropriated from the general operating budget of the District of Columbia the sum of $200,000 to carry out the purpose of this chapter. This sum does not include monies spent on existing programs for the Latino community.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Sept. 29, 1976, D.C. Law 1-86, title V, ยง 501, 23 DCR 2543.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-86
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1301.
